name: Fimfiction Ratings Boxifier
description: Brings back the old pre-Fimfiction 4.0 "boxy" ratings bar. The CSS code in this style was taken from an internet archive backup of Fimfiction before its 4.0 update, and modified to target the current site as best as possible.
additional_info: Credits to knighty & Xaquseg for writing the original CSS for Fimfiction.
